displayName.text: The Center NYC Chiropractor - Upper East Side

formattedAddress: 1085 Park Ave #1e, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1085 Park Ave #1e, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: After a year of back and neck pain and taking all kinds of pain pills and rubs I finally decided to see the chiropractor at the Center on Park. I wish I had gone sooner. The treatment combination that I was given included some good advice. Lose weight, reduce stress and keep better posture and wear better shoes. He was able relieve the pain and had some custom shoes inserts made so it would not come back. My shoes were forcing me to arch my back too much. My extra weight was adding an additional strain. Today I am lighter and pain free.

originalText.text: I have received acupuncture therapy at this chiropractor office on the Upper East Side to help me with shoulder pain. It has helped me a great deal. It used to be hard for me to raise my arm and now I can do it with almost no discomfort. I am feeling much better and have a greater range of motion than I have had in years. I would recommend the Center on Park to anyone who has pain.

originalText.text: I have been a patient at the Upper East Side Center, for about six months and I feel great. I used to suffer from chronic neck pain that was so bad that I could not even turn my head on some days. Thank to adjustments and changes in my diet and lifestyle I am better. I owe it all to chiropractor Dr. McCauley and her team for helping me.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of the Center on Park on the Upper East Side for a long time. I first came here when my back was sore from too much lifting. The chiropractor relieved that back pain through adjusting and has been giving me various adjustments ever since. I have never felt better and will continue seeing him on a regular basis.

The chiropractor relieved that back pain through adjusting and has been giving me various adjustments ever since. I have never felt better and will continue seeing him on a regular basis.

originalText.text: I went to the Center NYC Chiropractic when I had a chronic back pain. The doctor I originally went to told me it was sciatica but I think he was guessing. After two adjustments by Dr. Sadovnik the chiropractor, and orthotic shoes, the pain went away. The chiropractor explained how most shoes do not have proper support and that throws the whole body off balance. I will keep going back for adjustments from now on.
